info.description:
A comprehensive REST API built with Go and Gin framework
This API provides user authentication, profile management, and admin operations.
info.title: Gogin API

get.description: Get a paginated list of all OAuth clients (admin only)

post.description: Create a new OAuth 2.0 client application (admin only)

get.description: Get an OAuth client by ID (admin only)

post.description: Generate a new secret for an OAuth client (admin only)

put.description: Activate or deactivate an OAuth client (admin only)

get.description: Check if the API is running
Get paginated list of user notifications

post.description: Send a test email via SendGrid
Send a test SMS via Twilio
Request authorization code with PKCE support
Revoke an access or refresh token
Exchange authorization code, refresh token, or client credentials for access token

get.description: Get detailed system status including database, Redis, and NATS health
Get a paginated list of all users (admin only)

post.description: Authenticate user and receive access and refresh tokens
Logout the authenticated user and invalidate their session

get.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password

get.description: Get a specific user by their ID (admin only)

put.description: Update a user's profile information (admin only)
Update a user's status (active, inactive, or suspended) (admin only)

parameters.description: Status update details (status must be: active, inactive, or suspended)
parameters.name: request

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.description: Administrative user management endpoints (requires admin role)
tags.name: Admin
